user_request: install app "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google Play Store page for the Lyft app. It provides options to either open or uninstall the app. Below the app options, there are suggested apps such as TAPSI, AccuWeather, Airbnb, and others. Ads and suggestions for similar apps are displayed at the bottom of the page.
history_actions: click on the Play Store app located at the upper right.
click on the search icon located at the top-right.
click on the search clear icon "X" located at the top-right.
type in the content: "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
click on the app icon for Lyft located at the upper left.
click on the "Install" button located at the middle and lower middle part of the screen.

think_action.Thought: The Lyft app has already been installed as the 'Open' and 'Uninstall' options are visible, indicating that the installation is complete. The next step should involve verifying that the app has been successfully installed and opened.
Future Action Plan: Open the Lyft app to ensure the installation was successful.
If the app opens correctly, the installation request will be fulfilled.
think_action.Next Single Step Action: Click the 'Open' button to launch the Lyft app.
